text: "What a Girl Wants" is a 1999 pop song by American singer Christina Aguilera, from her first album Christina Aguilera. It peaked at number one on the Billboard Hot 100. The song was nominated for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance at the 43rd Grammy Awards but lost to Macy Gray's "I Try". ==Charts== Chart Peak Position Australia 5 Austria 22 Belgium (Flanders) 8 Belgium (Wallonia) 16 Finland 12 France 11 Netherlands 14 New Zealand 1 Spain 1 Sweden 24 Switzerland 17 ==References== Category:1999 songs Category:Christina Aguilera songs Category:Billboard Rhythmic Songs number-one singles Category:Teen pop songs
title: What a Girl Wants
